channel.title: I have the stupidest problem, with no solution (but i got pics!)
channel.description:
When i try to compile it says: [IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/5332/omgnoob1em9.png[/img] and the edit option is: [code]@echo off title ************ Compiler javac *.java pause[/code] all of my source files are in my java files: [IMG]http://img97.imageshack.us/img97/2843/omgnoob2oo4.png[/img] my user variables for John (my computer):
CLASSPATH variable: SET CLASSPATH=C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_06in;%CLASSPATH%;.
Path variable: C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_07in;C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_08in
anything im missing or need to do? Id really like to make new updates on my server, reward for person who helps me get my compile working. :) [br][size=1]Posted at: September 16, 2006, 07:54:48 PM[/size][hr]btw all my java jre and jdk are the latest ones, i updated them yesterday

item.title: I have the stupidest problem, with no solution (but i got pics!)
item.dc:creator: @Version Version
item.description:
@Version wrote:

@echo off title ******* Compiler javac *.java pause
lol mine works fine and that all i have in edit with the compiler.

item.title: I have the stupidest problem, with no solution (but i got pics!)
item.dc:creator: @pleya2 pleya2
item.description:
@pleya2 wrote:

K ill help first go to your compiler and put this:

@echo off
COLOR B
title *********** Server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Second go to your variables and edit it with this:
CLASSPATH
variable:
SET CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.

Path
variable:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin

that should work.

Read full topic
